title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Little Navmap - Using remote machine
description:
In this how to we are going to look at how to use Little Navmap using a remote machine. Using a remote machine gives you the ability to connect to your machine running Flight Simulator and keep track of your current location by using Little Navmap.

Little Navmap can be downloaded from this site: https://www.littlenavmap.org/

Little NavConnect can be found in: Little Navmap install dir\Little Navconnect

The aircraft performance files referred to in the video can be downloaded from this site:
https://www.littlenavmap.org/downloads/Aircraft%20Performance/MSFS/
